Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Marengo and Hale Counties. .Although levels have currently fallen below flood stage at Seldon Lock and Dam, a secondary crest just above flood stage is expected tomorrow afternoon. Therefore, a flood warning remains in effect.
